page.title: 01Haymarket Centre Leicester
page.content: The area around the{Clock Tower}has many shopping facilities. There is the {Market Place, Haymarket Centre}and the {Department Stores}eg{Co-op, Marks & {Spencers}and{Lewis's. The Haymarket Centre is particularly important as it offers indoor shopping facilities incorporating many well established stores such as{C&A, BHS, {Littlewoods}and{International.}There are also shops not so well known nationally eg{All Kinds}and{Zodiac.} Inside the Haymarket there are stairs, escalators and lifts linking the two floors to a roof car park. Seating facilities are provided along with cafes and restaurants. The presence of {Security Guards}ensures a pleasant atmosphere by curbing vandalism and theft, as well as the dropping of litter.
